start.title: Dublin Regulation
start.subtitle: What does this mean for you?

rules.title: Dublin Rules
rules.subtitle: The first EU country where you applied is responsible for your case

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.subtitle: Even under Dublin regulation, you have important rights

transfer.title: Transfer Process
transfer.subtitle: You have 6 months to be transferred, after which responsibility shifts to current country

appeal.title: Appeal Options
appeal.subtitle: You can challenge Dublin decisions in court

protection.title: Protection During Process
protection.subtitle: You cannot be deported while your case is pending
